import React from "react"; function Portfolio(props) { const student = props; console.log(student.data.length) return ( <> {student.data.map((post, index) => ( (index % 2 == 0) ? (
{post.lifedate}

{post.name}

{post.description}
) : (

{post.name}

{post.description}
{post.lifedate}
) ))} ) } export default Portfolio
